ygData.subject: What I've gathered so far
ygData.msgSnippet: Okay, here s the list of locations of gemstones so far.  I ve put them in order of cost, and included the costs only for basis of comparison. This is from a
ygData.messageBody:
Okay, here's the list of locations of gemstones so far. I've put them
in order of cost, and included the costs only for basis of comparison.
This is from a Dark Elf, with a Charisma of 89. I did not include any
stones from Nerriak, as the selection there is lousy, only about 7
stones total. If anyone can post the types of stones available at other
locations, I'll add them to the list. :) The list is also included as
a .txt file attachment.

-Bukaru, Teir'Dal Enchanter, Test Server

------

Legend: F- Felwithe, EC- East Commonlands,
WC- West Commonlands, WF- West Freeport HK- High Keep

Malachite 56
F (Merchant Tyslin), EC (Katha Firespinner),
WF (Lysin Smokkan), HK (Merchant Edina),
